suggestedTasks.title: Add integration test for /projects page rendering
suggestedTasks.description: Current tests are unit tests for the grouping logic. Add a Playwright or browser-based test that actually renders the /projects page and verifies sessions appear under correct project sections.
suggestedTasks.reason: Unit tests cover logic but not actual DOM rendering

patterns: Group related tests with describe blocks for spawn API, session grouping, and E2E flow
gotchas: Session grouping priority: task.id prefix takes precedence over session.project field
